publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3406.1 Christopher Harvie: No Place for Chauvinism in 21st Century Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-3406) in the name of Claire Baker, leave out from "starting" to end and insert "to follow the lead set by the First Minister to support calls for the principal to be offered membership regardless of gender and for club members to encourage actively the nomination and acceptance of women members." Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Joe FitzPatrick*
